title: Capture Me
description: An alternate cover for this ASIN can be found here.Smith and Belle's captivating story races towards its breathtaking conclusion in Capture Me.  I never expected to fall in love with Smith Price. Now he was more than my lover. He was my obsession. My savior. My future.  But someone had to pay for the sins of our fathers. Ghosts don't always haunt you. Sometimes they stalk you down and demand retribution.  We promised each other forever, but we might not live to see tomorrow.
author: Geneva Lee
